name: 林鈞陶
objective: This course aims to explore MIMO transceiver design problem. Much attention will be focused on the MIMO precoder designs for linear and nonlinear receivers.
schedule:
(subject to change based on class progress)
Week 1: Introduction.
Week 2: Basic matrix operations.
Week 3: Basic matrix operations.
Week 4: MIMO receiver design.
Week 5: MIMO receiver design.
Week 6: Mideterm I
Week 7: MIMO antenna selection
Week 8: MIMO antenna selection.
Week 9: Precoder design for linear receivers. 
Week 10: Precoder design for SIC receivers. 
Week 11: Precoder design for SIC receivers. 
Week 12: Precoder design for ML receivers. 
Week 13: Precoder design for ML receivers. 
Week 14: Midterm II
Week 15: Other transceiver designs.
Week 16: Final Projects
Week 17: Final Projects
Week 18: Final Projects
scorePolicy:
Quizzes      30%
Midterm I   15%
Midterm II  15%
Final Projects 40% (can be in Chinese/English)
materials: Slides and selected papers (You may need sufficient backgrounds regarding linear algebra and matrix analysis.)
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
If the distance class becomes necessary, all the lectures, midterms, final project will be held via Google Meet. We will have strict roll calls during the distance class, and you may be required to turn on the camera or mic in the class.
